name: Cloud Mage
description:
What's a cloud mage to do when a client comes knocking? Make them a weather spell with the help of your trusty familiar, of course!

- - -

Done in Ren'py. This was my submission for My First Game Jam. Thank you cloudhime and lysander!

Devlog - get all the sordid details of my toil and mistakes

- - - Music Credits

Lullaby by Podington Bear, under these terms.

Someone Kill Jt by Cory Gray, under these terms.

Ma Vie Quotidienne by Roganis, under these terms.

Music and sfx also used from Partners In Rhyme, Glitch, and Freesound.
